輟.definition: to stop (before completion); to cease; to suspend

輟學.definition: to drop out of school; to leave off studying; to interrupt one's studies

輟朝.definition: to suspend business at the imperial court on account of a misfortune

輟業.definition: to give up work; to give up one's profession

輟演.definition: to stop performing a play; to interrupt a stage run

輟筆.definition: to stop writing or painting; to leave off writing midway

輟耕.definition: to stop plowing; to give up a life in the fields

輟食吐哺.definition: to stop eating and spit out
